alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Madison; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rankin, northeastern Hinds and south central Madison Counties through 845 AM CST... At 759 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ridgeland, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Madison around 805 AM CST. Gluckstadt around 810 AM CST. Canton and Fannin around 820 AM CST. Goshen Springs around 830 AM CST. Pisgah around 835 AM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
